title: Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility response schema
description: This schema defines the response to an eligibility assessment request

monthly_gross_income.description: The monthly gross income calculated from the individual income values given

upper_income_threshold.description: The upper income threshold that was used (valies according to the circumstances of the applicant)

monthly_disposable_income.description: The monthly dispasable income calculated from the individual income values given and allowable expenses

disposable_income_lower_threshold.description: The lower threshold of the monthly disposable income used in the calculation

disposable_income_upper_threshold.description: The upper threshold of the monthly disposable income used in the calculation

liquid_capital_assessment.description: Aggregate value of lowest balances of bank accounts during the calculation period

property.description: Details of property values and calculations

disposable_capital_assessment.description: The applicant's disposable capital calculated after subtracting allowable items from the list of capital assets given

total_capital_lower_threshold.description: The lower threshold of the capital allowance used in the calculation

total_capital_upper_threshold.description: The upper threshold of the capital allowance used in the calculation

main_dwelling.description: Details of value, equity, mortgage and allowances for the main dwelling

dwelling.description: Details of value, equity, mortgages and debts for a property

notional_sale_costs_pctg.description: Notional sale costs (as a percentage) deducted from property value

net_value_after_mortgage.description: Value of property after deduction of outstanding mortgage

percentage_owned.description: Percentage of property owned by applicant

shared_with_housing_assoc.description: Whether the rules defining shared ownership were applied

net_equity_value.description: Value of applicant's equity in the property

property_disregard.description: Value of the property disregarded for Legal Aid purposes

assessed_capital_value.description: Assessed capital value after all deductions on this property

date_of_purchase.description: The date the vehicle was purchased

in_regular_use.description: Whether or not the vehicle is in regular use by the applicant or their partner

assessed_value.description: The assessed value of the vehicle after deducting any allowances

monthly_contribution.description: The monthly contribution required from the applicant

capital_contribution.description: The capital contribution required from the applicant

assessment_id.description: A unique id for this eligibilty check

client_reference_id.description: The client reference id specified in the request, if present

result.description:
The result of the eligibility check as  follows:
eligible: Eligible for legal aid
not_eligible: Not eligible for legal aid
contribution_required: The applicant is eligible for legal aid, but a monthly contribution and/or a capital contribution as specified in the details is required
out_of_scope: This applicant is out of scope for automatic determination of eligibility

details.description: Interim values used in the calculation

passported.description: Whether or not the applicant receives a qualifying benefit

self_employed.description: Whether or not the applicant is self-employed

income.descripion: Aggregate income details and allowances used in calculation

capital.description: Aggregate capital details and allowances used in calculation

contributions.description: Details of any contributions required, if any
